function_render_admin_acl_46.name: render_admin_acl
function_render_admin_acl_46.content:
def render_admin_acl(
    request: Request,
    users: Any,
    collections: Any,
    grants: Any,
    deletion_enabled: bool = False,
    work_dir: str = "/work",
    refresh_ms: int = 5000,
    status_code: int = 200,
) -> Any:
    return _templates.TemplateResponse(
        "admin/acl.html",
        {
            "request": request,
            "title": "CTXCE Admin ACL",
            "users": users,
            "collections": collections,
            "grants": grants,
            "deletion_enabled": bool(deletion_enabled),
            "work_dir": work_dir,
            "staging_enabled": bool(is_staging_enabled() if callable(is_staging_enabled) else False),
            "refresh_ms": int(refresh_ms) if refresh_ms is not None else 5000,
        },
        status_code=status_code,
    )

function_render_admin_error_73.name: render_admin_error
